#summary CVACARS 0.1 Requirements
#labels Phase-Requirements,Milestone-0.1prealpha,Featured

== Introduction ==

This is an overview of the initial requirements for the 0.1 CVACARS


== Details ==
=== Objectives ===
  * Pilot login with website credentials
  * Pilot PIREP submission
  * Logbook retrieval
  * Basic dispatch capabilities (Provide dispatch release, print)
  * Basic weather capabilities (METAR, TAF)
